name: Attack Helicopter Dating Simulator
description: As a helicopter, your daily activities may include, morning maintenance, aerial attack runs, and delivering hell-fire missiles on noncombatants for democracy. Or you know, dating other helicopters. It is a visual novel after all...
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP or Newer Processor: 1Ghz+ Memory: 1 GB RAM Storage: 1 GB available space Additional Notes: There was enough computing power on the V2 rocket to run this game
